duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide emergency care to small animals, including surgical procedures and medical treatments.
Collaborate with the team to ensure high-quality care and effective communication.
Utilize expertise in exotics, endoscopy, and ultrasound for emergency cases.
Maintain positive relationships with referring veterinarians and other team members.
Work night shifts, weekends, holidays, and maintain a strong work ethic at all times.

education_certification.credential: Degree in Veterinary Medicine (DVM or VMD)
